pkmkdoc.description: GISLook and GISMeta are Quick Look and Spotlight plugins for GIS data.

choice.title: GISLook
choice.tooltip: QuickLook plugin for previewing GIS data.
choice.description: GISLook is a Quick Look plugin that shows GIS data in the Finder. Vector formats: ESRI Shape, E00 ArcInfo Interchange, and ArcInfo Coverage. Raster grid formats: BIL, BIP, BSQ, ESRI ASCII and Binary Grid, PGM, SRTM, Surfer Grid and USGS DEM.

choice.title: GISMeta
choice.tooltip: Spotlight plugin showing the size of GIS raster data in the Finder.
choice.description: GISMeta is a Spotlight plugin that shows the size of GIS raster grids in the Finder. Supported formats: BIL, BIP, BSQ, ESRI ASCII and Binary Grid, PGM, SRTM, Surfer Grid and USGS DEM.
